1. How is interest on the loan calculated?

 We use the formular: Interest is = 0.07*loan amount borrowed*period.

 2. How is the loan disbursed?

 We disburse loans only to M-Pesa numbers.

 3. How can I extend my loan repayment period?

 Contact our customer service and they will enable you to safely extend the period.

 4. Our Physical Location.

 Nairobi, Kenya

Income - This is perhaps, one of the most important factors that we consider while determining your eligibility for a loan. Your eligibility for a loan is higher if you income is on the higher side simply because your repayment capacity is higher. Your maximum loan amount will also be enhanced if your earning is high.

Age - Age is also another factor that affects your home loan eligibility significantly and also helps the lender to determine the term of the loan. The younger you are, the higher will be your eligibility for a loan.

 Credit Score - We will look at your credit score to determine your loan eligibility and 750 is the minimum score that you should have.

 Debt Obligation - If your debt obligation is high, your eligibility for a loan may be lower simply because we will assume that you may not be able to pay the EMIs for the loan.

 Occupation - Your occupation is a vital determinant of your eligibility for a home loan. If you are a salaried individual, your eligibility will be higher since you have a stable source of income. Professionals such as doctors, architects, etc., and self-employed individuals such as businessmen are also eligible for a home loan.

 NB: Above Tips apply mostly on the second loan application
